title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1704.2 - Cell equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1704.2 - Cell equipment

State Regulations
(a) This
section does not apply to double-cell housing in converted single cells; see

Part 1701 of this Title. (b) The
following items shall be provided: (1)
lighting equal to at least 20 foot-candles at desk level and in the personal
grooming area; (2)
washstand; (3)
toilet; and
(4)
bed, mattress and pillow
(for each inmate). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1704.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
